company_info.Company Description: ABM Travels & Tours Pvt. Ltd.ABM Travels & Tours Pvt. Ltd. is one of the leading Business Travel organization, was established in 1992, in the heart of Delhi. With an innovative thought to indelibly reinvent the business of corporate travel ABM characterizes the dawn of a new era, which would be set as parameter to specify new goals in travel industry with a perfect simultaneous approach to achieve them in time. An innovative approach to provide best of the services, for travel in domestic and international domain .

jd_information.description: Dear Candidate ,Greetings from ABM Travels & Tours Pvt ltd .Required Experience Candidate Location : Khar West , Mumbai  Job Description:Interested Candidate can apply. Kindly drop your resume at hr@abmtravels.net or contact.
